ygData.subject: Re: A Maximal Victory
ygData.msgSnippet: Lunarpine thinks Damn, theres more holes in this place than craters on the moon. after hearing Ramhorns message. Megatrons been a thorn in the Maximals side

Lunarpine thinks "Damn, theres more holes in this place than craters 
on the moon." after hearing Ramhorns message. "Megatrons been a thorn 
in the Maximals side since the Maximals were Autobots, I say we teach 
this megalomaniac (I love that word) that the Maximals aren't just 
defenders, I say we turn him into so much scrap that garbage skows 
reject him."

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Ramhorn::
> 
> Ramhorn lets out a sigh of relief as Megatron flies off.
> 
> "Megs's out of here," he says into his comm-link to Lunarpine, "The 
place 
> looks intact."
> 
> He switches the comm to all Maximal frequences, "Whoever 
neutralized that 
> blast, thanx!"
